trends: There have been no other sightings in Fort Benton
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy boy friend and I where traveling in the car on the way to Fort Benton. We both noticed it out the front windshield. At first i thought it was just a star but it got much bright and bigger.(about 3 times bigger and brighter)Then it went back to looking like a star again and moved to the right until I could no longer see it.
